ACCOUNT NO. :{%set b_ac=frappe.db.get_value("Bank Account",{"is_default":1},"bank_account_no")%}{%if b_ac != None%}{{b_ac}}{%endif%}, IN FAVOUR OF: {{doc.company}}

{%if doc.terms != None%}{{doc.terms}}{%endif%} For{{doc.company}}

DECLARATION
We declare that this invoice shows the actual price of the goods described and that all particulars are true and correct.
